description: Can you choose the word pair that best complete a group of sentences?
title: Test Yourself | English, Jan. 20, 2012
title_page: Test Yourself | English, Jan. 20, 2012 - The New York Times
text:
This question was written by Shannon Doyne. It comes from the article “He Just Can’t Turn In the Badge.”
